  • Fields 
    Field Description
    com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ISegmentedAsset.SEG_FILE_TYPE_HSS
    com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common.SettingFlag.SETTING_SEGMENT_RATE
    This method of setting update intervals has been deprecated, the setting will not be honored after 3.15.14
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.IAssetManager.createHLSSegmentedAsset​(URL, int, String, String, boolean, boolean, IQueue.IQueuedAssetPermissionObserver)

    com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.IBackplane.sync()
    com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ISettings.getProgressUpdatesPerSegment()
    This method of controlling updates will not work any more as of 3.15.14, the method will be removed in a future release.
    com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ISettings.save()
    Updates to settings are saved as changes are made. This is now a no-op.
    com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ISettings.setLanguagesSettings​(ILanguageSettings)
    Updates to language settings are now saved as changes are made
    com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ISettings.setMimeTypeSettings​(IMimeTypeSettings)
    Updates to mime type settings are now saved as changes are made
    com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ISettings.setProgressUpdatesPerSegment​(int)
    This method of controlling updates will not work any more as of 3.15.14, the method will be removed in a future release.
    com.penthera.virtuososdk.service.VirtuosoForegroundServiceHandler.getForegroundServiceNotificationProvider()
    This has been replaced with a manifest entry to specify the class implemented IForegroundNotificationProvider.
